bung.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a round piece of rubber, wood etc used to close the top of a container
bung.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: money given to someone secretly, and usually illegally, to make them do something
bung.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: to put something somewhere quickly and carelessly
bung.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Can you bung these clothes in the washing machine?
